attributes.action: create greater incentives and support for the purchase of environmentally friendly vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there are tax and running cost penalties for driving vehicles that have a high environmental impact. Greater adoption of 'green vehicle' technology could be encouraged by creating a scheme that significantly reduced the cost of purchasing such vehicles as often the initial capital outlay is much higher than for conventional vehicles, this will kick start wider adoption of green technology for transport and set a pathway for improved economies of scale and greater take up in the short/medium term

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
